snippet.title: Project '06 - Shadow Release
snippet.description:
The second installment of Project '06's episodic releases and the full release of Shadow's Trial Campaign accompanied by Sonic's Trial Campaign with enhancements!

This release contains the stages every stage available in Shadow's and Sonic's story.

Now something to mention:
This release has been on beta testing for well over a year, we did everything in our power to make this release as bug free as possible, however there's always the possibility that some issues may pop up, keep that in mind. Enjoy!

(UPDATED TO SILVER RELEASE PATCHED VERSION)
Download:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W_OOFWVBta8sS5-YhhZmU4yv4Y8_Ig2p/view?usp=sharing
Mirrors:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/13ht2-zuiRthb_tTnYYsPQgAjf8diqt0E/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-xV-4K8vvORB3szZky_uG7n7cUck-fKU/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MX7cCqQymmUOnq_V717tcrST0nMDfi8t/view?usp=sharing
ANOTHER Mirror:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/2yn53pixmh8qeh0/Project_06_-_Silver_Release_%2528Patch%2529.zip/file

Editing and composition by ChaosX.
Footage recorded by JeraCyclo Gaming (Volcano the Bat):
https://www.youtube.com/c/VolcanoTheBat
